PLAYER.CLEARCONFIRM: Are you sure you wish to clear the animation queue?
PLAYER.DESCRIPTION: Use the buttons below to either play an animation right away, or build a queue of animations to play in sequence.
PLAYER.QUEUEQUEUE: Play animation queue after current animation finishes
PLAYER.TITLE: Sprite Animation Player

TOOLTIPS.QUEUE: Play {name} animation after current one ends
TOOLTIPS.ADD: Add {name} animation to list to play
